segments.text: Merry Christmas , Mr . Wang . I would like to give you the book I specially chose as my appreciation for your sincere help to me in the past few days .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Thanks , Mr . White . That's very kind of you .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I hope it will be of some use to you .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I am sure it will . It'll be of great help in carrying on the work I have done so far .
segments.speaker: S2
